About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Jaehong Lee (Jay)

I am a second year Engineering student at Simon Fraser University with a serious passion for software development.
I constantly invest my time in studying the latest cutting-edge technologies and am a strong believer in consistent work.
Currently on a Co-op term to find the right team where my skills can be an asset and contribute to the growth of the company.

UI/UX

I create funny websites for my friends and family to share laughter and joy.

Photo/Video Editing

As a visual person, I enjoy editing photos & videos to create fun projects.

Sports

I enjoy playing competitive basketball, baseball, and soccer with my friends during my spare time.
